name: WTF WARS - Companion & Pets
description:
Another World Trade Fun game is here, this time you need to help the heros to rescue the farmers pets.

Use AWSD or Arrows to move.

Mouse: Right click to switch between heroes. 

Mouse: Left click to shoot or attack.

Debug: Return to restart anytime.

F: Fullscreen

Escape: Exit fullscreen

Click on leaderboard icon to send your total coins to Liluo.io

Enjoy!

I submitted the game within 3 days so I can fix all the bugs.

Leaderboards: 

https://liluo.io/ulisesfreitas/wtf-wars-companion-pets?leaderboardId=1f7e552f-c8...
